name: Sabrewing
resistance: cold, fire, lighting; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The sabrewing doesn’t provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The sabrewing’s weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sabrewing makes two attacks with its wings.

actions.name: Wings
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage, and the target begins bleeding out. While the target is bleeding out, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw at the beginning of its turns, or its maximum hit points are reduced by 7 (2d6). Bleeding out continues until the target or another creature uses an action to make a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Medicine) check, or if the target receives magical healing.
